create-root-folders.mutation: mutation CreateFolder($input: CreateFolderInput!) { folder { create(language: "en", input: $input, disableComponentValidation: true) { id } } }

create-options-folders.mutation: mutation CreateFolder($input: CreateFolderInput!) { folder { create(language: "en", input: $input, disableComponentValidation: true) { id } } }

create-options-products.mutation: mutation CreateProduct($input: CreateProductInput!) { product { create(language: "en", input: $input, disableComponentValidation: true) { id } } }

create-brands.mutation: mutation CreateDocument($input: CreateDocumentInput!) { document { create(language: "en", input: $input, disableComponentValidation: true) { id } } }

create-tiles.mutation: mutation CreateDocument($input: CreateDocumentInput!) { document { create(language: "en", input: $input, disableComponentValidation: true) { id } } }

create-paints.mutation: mutation CreateProduct($input: CreateProductInput!) { product { create(language: "en", input: $input, disableComponentValidation: true) { id } } }

json.textContent: A selection of classic frame colors.

create-main-product.mutation: mutation CreateProduct($input: CreateProductInput!) { product { create(language: "en", input: $input, disableComponentValidation: true) { id } } }

json.textContent: A classic curved bicycle re-imageined and engineered in modern materials. No plastic.
Speed Curve is a heritage bicycle designed with modern materials and vintage lines.

add-item-relations.mutation: mutation UpdateVariantComponent($productId: ID!, $sku: String!, $input: ComponentInput!) { product { updateVariantComponent(productId: $productId, sku: $sku,  language: "en", input: $input, disableValidation: true) { id }}}

add-showcases.mutation: mutation UPDATE_IMAGE_DETAILS($key: String!, $input: UpdateImageInput!) { image { update(key: $key, language: "en", input: $input) { key } } }

publish-folders.mutation: mutation PublishItems($ids: [ID!]!) { publishItems(language: "en", ids: $ids, disableComponentValidation: true) { ... on PublishItemsRequest { success { itemId } } } }

publish-documents.mutation: mutation PublishItems($ids: [ID!]!) { publishItems(language: "en", ids: $ids, disableComponentValidation: true) { ... on PublishItemsRequest { success { itemId } } } }

publish-products.mutation: mutation PublishItems($ids: [ID!]!) { publishItems(language: "en", ids: $ids, disableComponentValidation: true) { ... on PublishItemsRequest { success { itemId } } } }
